item.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – AVAILABLE

 
 
 
This game is still either in Early-Alpha or Beta (or any status in between) but IS already available for sale / early access, so CAN BE PLAYED.

 


We thought that our sun would last another five billion years.
We were wrong.

Now the battle for humanity has begun.

Game Features

New Missions

Wage war against the Children of Dawn in all new missions! Now featuring LESS ESCORT! :) Train around a never-before-discovered planet, survive a massive capital ship battle in deep space, bombard a fuel refinery, and so much more!

Stunning Environments

Visit gorgeous landmarks in our Solar System including: Pluto and the Kuiper Belt, Neptune’s Moon Triton, Neptune, Saturn, Uranus, Titan, and more!

More Pilot-able Ships

Pilot multiple ships – each with their own distinct look and feel. Our ships also feature new handling physics blending realism with accessibility, transfer energy between various ship subsystems, and even repair in mid-flight!

Enhanced Audio

All new music designed to get your blood pumping during intense dogfights, new sound effects improve the overall aural feeling of the game, and new voiceover to accompany the new and improved missions!

Source: The Developer Website.
